Objective:
 Guess the secret 4-digit number chosen by the computer.


Game Rules:
 • The computer randomly selects a 4-digit number with unique digits (no repeating digits).
 • You have to guess the correct number.


Feedback System:
 After each guess, you will receive feedback:


Strike: A digit is correct and in the correct position.
 Ball: A digit is correct but in the wrong position.
 Out: None of the digits are correct.


Examples:
 If the secret number is 1234:
 • Guess 1235 → 3 Strikes, 0 Balls (1, 2, 3 are correct)
 • Guess 4321 → 0 Strikes, 4 Balls (all digits exist but wrong positions)
 • Guess 5678 → 0 Strikes, 0 Balls (Out)
 • Guess 1324 → 2 Strikes, 2 Balls (1, 2 correct position, 3, 4 wrong position)


Winning:
 Get 4 Strikes to win the game!


Good luck!

Objective:
 A 2-player reaction game. Be the first to draw on the correct signal!


Setup:
 • This game requires 2 players sharing one phone.
 • Each player has their own DRAW button on their side.


How to Play:
 1. The game starts with a light red background. This is the waiting state.
 2. After a random time, the screen will suddenly change color.
 3. It can change to GREEN (a fake signal) or BLUE (the real signal).


Winning:
 • Press your button only when the screen turns BLUE.
 • The first player to press on blue wins!


Losing:
 • If you press while the screen is light red (too early), you lose.
 • If you press while the screen is GREEN (a fake signal), you lose.


Key is to wait for the BLUE signal and ignore the GREEN one!


Good luck!
